column7: Covers current issues in various advertising areas not studied extensively in other courses. 1 to 3 undergraduate hours. 1 to 3 graduate hours. May be repeated in the same or separate terms to a maximum of 6 hours. Prerequisite: Announced separately for each topic. Restricted to students with Junior, Senior, or Graduate class standing.
